title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Cultural Heritage and Computing Convergence Education: Simulation/VR-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain cultural heritage cases by connecting them to computing concepts (data representation, abstraction).
Learners can design simple simulation programs reflecting cultural elements in VR environments.
Learners can derive at least three improvement points for culture-based computing solutions through peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
